column2: I will not be describing any such experience with this sort of intensity. First
column3: the pros - for a Friday night in Chicago
column5: 000 oncology professionals were in town as well as countless others for a Taylor Swift concert
column6: I was extremely pleased that our party of four only encountered a 15-minute wait. The decor was very authentic
column9: and our waitress was very friendly and helpful. She happily split our bill four ways
column10: even allowing us to separate out the alcohol on another check (we needed to do this for reimbursement purposes).
